post.title: Thanks for all your help
post.body:
This is my first time to set up a zite on zeronet. Honestly speaking, this is the first site I have published on the internet.

I have no idea where it will go and how far it could go. I just want to thank All the warm-hearted users in zeronet to be a peer making this zite work.

I don't know where you are from, I don't know who you are, but I feel the strength of the open, free, great spirit of Internet. Thanks! Thank You for giving me the motivation to keep moving on this field.

May God bless all of you, my friends!

post.title: Perfect from one direction
post.body:
Dreaming dreams. What's dream? Who's dreaming?

Life. The life starts from passion between woman and man.

![New_Bitmap_Image__3_.bmp (562x514)](data/img/post_4_New_Bitmap_Image__3_.bmp)

Living. Living is a status on the process of humankind. 

![New_Bitmap_Image__6_.bmp (1004x643)](data/img/post_4_New_Bitmap_Image__6_.bmp)

Future. It's uncertainty of everything. You know it will come but the results you can image.

post.body:

post.title: 洋葱
post.body:
洋葱它是一种食物，健康。

洋葱也是一种生活，精致。

洋葱更是一种理念，放心。
